data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 97 believers in Daglig-Shirvan.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Daglig-Shirvan, Azerbaijan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Daglig-Shirvan, Azerbaijan a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Daglig-Shirvan access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Daglig-Shirvan, Azerbaijan with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Azerbaijani people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Azerbaijani people.
Father, help the 97 believers in Daglig-Shirvan to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Daglig-Shirvan.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Daglig-Shirvan, Azerbaijan by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
